page.description: Refreshes the data in one or more client-side data cache items.

argument.name: UXClientSideDataCacheItem
argument.description: A comma delimited list of data items to refresh. Can also be '*[js:*all]*' to refresh all data items.

argument.name: onComplete
argument.description: A Javascript function to execute once all items have been refreshed.

page.terms: ux component,client side data cache,offline access,disconnected applications,mobile apps,javascript functions
